00059 // base class for the dock extension applets..
00060 // this should be probably moved out of here
00061 class KVIRC_API KviDockExtension
00062 {
00063 protected:
00064         Qt::WindowStates m_uStoredWindowState;
00065 public:
00066         KviDockExtension() : m_uStoredWindowState(0){};
00067         virtual ~KviDockExtension(){};
00068 public:
00069         void setPrevWindowState(Qt::WindowStates state) { m_uStoredWindowState = state; };
00070         Qt::WindowStates getPrevWindowState() { return m_uStoredWindowState; };
00071 
00072         virtual void refresh(){};
00073         virtual void die(){ delete this; };
00074 };

00078 class KVIRC_API KviFrame : public KviTalMainWindow // , public KviIrcContextManager
00079 {
00080         friend class KviWindow;
00081         friend class KviConsole;
00082         friend class KviApp;
00083         friend class KviServerParser;
00084         friend class KviMexToolBar;
00085         friend class KviMdiManager;
00086         friend class KviIrcContext;
00087         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00088         friend class KviLagMeter;
00089         friend class KviUserListView;
00090         friend class KviUserListViewArea;
00091         Q_OBJECT
00092 public:
00093         KviFrame();
00094         ~KviFrame();
00095 protected:
00096         // subwindows
00097         QSplitter                             * m_pSplitter;                     // the frame is splitted vertically and thus can host widgets
00098         KviMenuBar                            * m_pMenuBar;                      // the main menu bar
00099         KviMdiManager                         * m_pMdi;                          // the mdi manager widget (child of the splitter)
00100         KviPointerList<KviMexToolBar>         * m_pModuleExtensionToolBarList;   // the module extension toolbars
00101         KviWindowListBase                        * m_pWindowList;                      // the WindowList
00102         KviStatusBar                          * m_pStatusBar;
00103         // the mdi workspace child windows
00104         KviPointerList<KviWindow>             * m_pWinList;                      // the main list of windows
00105         KviIrcContext                         * m_pActiveContext;                // the context of the m_pActiveWindow
00106         // other
00107         KviDockExtension                      * m_pDockExtension;                // the frame's dock extension: this should be prolly moved ?
00108 public:
00109         // the mdi manager: handles mdi children
00110         KviMdiManager * mdiManager(){ return m_pMdi; };
00111         // the splitter is the central widget for this frame
00112         QSplitter * splitter(){ return m_pSplitter; };
00113         // KviWindowListBase is the base class for KviTreeWindowList and the KviClassicWindowList
00114         KviWindowListBase * windowListWidget(){ return m_pWindowList; };
00115         // well.. the menu bar :D
00116         KviMenuBar * mainMenuBar(){ return m_pMenuBar; };
00117         KviStatusBar * mainStatusBar(){ return m_pStatusBar; };
00118         // this function may return 0 if the active window has no irc context
00119         KviIrcContext * activeContext(){ return m_pActiveContext; };
00120         // shortcut to a = activeContext(); return a ? a->connection() : 0
00121         KviIrcConnection * activeConnection();
00122         // The list of the windows belonging to this frame
00123         // Note that the windows may be also undocked, but they are still owned by the frame
00124         KviPointerList<KviWindow> * windowList() { return m_pWinList; };
00125         // Sets the specified window to be the active one
00126         // Raises it and focuses it
00127         void setActiveWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00128         // Adds a new KviWindow to this frame
00129         // This should be done just after the KviWindow constructor has returned
00130         // If bShow is false then the window is not explicitly shown
00131         // otherwise it is set as active window.
00132         void addWindow(KviWindow *wnd,bool bShow = true); // public for modules
00133         void closeWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00134         // Checks if a specified window is still existing in this frame child
00135         // window list. This is useful for asynchronous functions
00136         // that keep a window pointer and need to ensure that it is still
00137         // valid after an uncontrolled delay. (Think of a /timer implementation)
00138         bool windowExists(KviWindow * wnd){ return (m_pWinList->findRef(wnd) != -1); };
00139         // The number of consoles in this frame
00140         unsigned int consoleCount();
00141         // Creates a new console window. DON'T use the KviConsole constructor directly.
00142         // (The script creation events are triggered from here)
00143         KviConsole * createNewConsole(bool bFirstInFrame = false);
00144         // Returns the first available console.
00145         // There is almost always an available console.
00146         // Exceptions are the startup and the shutdown (see activeWindow())
00147         KviConsole * firstConsole();
00148         // Returns the first console that has no connection in progress
00149         // This function CAN return 0 if all the consoles are connected
00150         KviConsole * firstNotConnectedConsole();
00151         // this is explicitly dedicated to the DockExtension applets
00152         void setDockExtension(KviDockExtension * e){ m_pDockExtension = e; };
00153         // returns the dockExtension applet. Useful for calling refresh() when
00154         // some particular event happens
00155         KviDockExtension * dockExtension(){ return m_pDockExtension; };
00156         // helper for saving the window properties
00157         void saveWindowProperties(KviWindow * wnd,const QString &szSection);
00158         // finds the module extension toolbar with the specified identifier
00159         // see kvi_moduleextension.h and kvi_mextoolbar.h
00160         KviMexToolBar * moduleExtensionToolBar(int extensionId);
00161         // Helper to fill the toolbars popup
00162         // it is used by KviToolBar and KviMenuBar
00163         void fillToolBarsPopup(KviTalPopupMenu * p);
00169         void setUsesBigPixmaps(bool bUse);
00170         
00171 public slots:
00172         void newConsole();
00173         void executeInternalCommand(int index);
00174         void toggleStatusBar();
00175         void customizeToolBars();
00176 protected:
00177         void restoreModuleExtensionToolBars();
00178         void saveModuleExtensionToolBars();
00179         void registerModuleExtensionToolBar(KviMexToolBar * t);
00180         void unregisterModuleExtensionToolBar(KviMexToolBar * t);
00181 
00182         void unhighlightWindowsOfContext(KviIrcContext * c);
00183 
00184         void createWindowList();
00185         void recreateWindowList();
00186 
00187         KviMdiChild * dockWindow(KviWindow *wnd,bool bCascade = true,QRect * setGeom = 0);
00188         void undockWindow(KviWindow *wnd);
00189 
00190         // called by KviWindow
00191         void childWindowCloseRequest(KviWindow *wnd);
00192         void childWindowActivated(KviWindow *wnd, bool bForce = false);
00193 
00194         void childContextStateChange(KviIrcContext * c);
00195         void childConnectionNickNameChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00196         void childConnectionAwayStateChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00197         void childConnectionUserModeChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00198         void childConnectionLagChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00199         void childConnectionServerInfoChange(KviIrcConnection * c);
00200         void childWindowSelectionStateChange(KviWindow * pWnd,bool bGotSelectionNow);
00201 
00202         virtual void closeEvent(QCloseEvent *e);
00203         virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *e);
00204         virtual void moveEvent(QMoveEvent *e);
00205         virtual bool focusNextPrevChild(bool next);
00206         virtual void changeEvent(QEvent * event);
00207 
00208         void updatePseudoTransparency();
00209         void installAccelerators();
00210 protected slots:
00211         void switchToNextWindow();
00212         void switchToPrevWindow();
00213         void switchToNextHighlightedWindow();
00214         void switchToPrevHighlightedWindow();
00215         void switchToNextWindowInContext();
00216         void switchToPrevWindowInContext();
00217 
00218         void maximizeWindow();
00219         void minimizeWindow();
00220 
00221         void accelActivated();
00222         void toolbarsPopupSelected(int id);
00223 signals:
00224         void activeWindowChanged();       // almost never 0.. but may be
00225         void activeContextChanged();      // may be 0!
00226         void activeContextStateChanged(); // emitted only when the active context is non 0 and it changes state
00227         void activeConnectionNickNameChanged();
00228         void activeConnectionUserModeChanged();
00229         void activeConnectionAwayStateChanged();
00230         void activeConnectionServerInfoChanged();
00231         void activeConnectionLagChanged();
00232         void activeWindowSelectionStateChanged(bool bGotSelectionNow);
00233         void signalMaximizeMdiChildWindow(KviMdiChild * lpC);
00234 protected:
00235         void applyOptions();
00236 private:
00237         void saveToolBarPositions();
00238         void restoreToolBarPositions();
00239 };
